tinygp
the tiniest of Gaussian Process libraries

`tinygp` is an extremely lightweight library for building Gaussian Process (GP)models in Python, built on top of [`jax`](https://github.com/google/jax). It hasa [nice interface][api-ref], and it's [pretty fast][benchmarks]. Thanks to`jax`, `tinygp` supports things like GPU acceleration and automaticdifferentiation.Check out the docs for more info: [tinygp.readthedocs.io][docs][api-ref]: https://tinygp.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api/index.html[benchmarks]: https://tinygp.readthedocs.io/en/latest/benchmarks.html[docs]: https://tinygp.readthedocs.io
